arts.ttl: Christian Ilzer: “The result was fair in terms of performance”
arts.sum: Hoffenheim and Heidenheim coaches shared their opinion about the 1-1 draw between the teams.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim fight back to earn draw against Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Adrian Beck of Heidenheim challenges Arthur Chaves of Hoffenheim, showcasing the intensity that earned him Player of the Match honours - IMAGO/Hansjürgen Britsch Heidenheim shared the spoils against Hoffenheim in an eventful affair of two halves, with goals from Haris Tabaković and Budu Zivzivadze ensuring that both sides earn a valuable point to close out matchday 25.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. Heidenheim preview: Hosts looking to end wait for home win
arts.sum: Hoffenheim will attempt to claim their first Bundesliga home win since November when they welcome Heidenheim to the PreZero Arena.

Both sides exited European competitions recently, so at least have more time to concentrate on their Bundesliga bread and butter. It's less of a relegation six-pointer as Hoffenheim have moved away ...

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim set asking price for their in-form midfielder
arts.sum: Anton Stach, who has been on Eintracht Frankfurt’s radar for quite some time, could remain at Hoffenheim if the Eagles don’t meet the asking price.

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
